title: Three security force members killed in southern Iran
body: Overnight clashes in Iran's southern province of Kerman killed at least three security personnel and a civilian, state media reported yesterday. "Three security officers and one citizen were martyred in the area of Fahraj checkpoint located in the east of Kerman province," the Revolutionary Guards said, in a statement carried by the official IRNA news agency. "The incident happened last night during clashes between terrorist elements and forces stationed at the checkpoint," the Kerman police said in a separate statement posted by IRNA. The statement promised "intelligence and operational measures to identify and decisively deal with the perpetrators of this crime".
